key.name: show-apport-crashes
key.description: If this is disabled, the user will not be notified about pending apport crash reports.

key.name: end-system-uids
key.summary: The maximum UID that is reserved for system users
key.description: Update-notifier will not be started for system users, this specifies the upper bound of this range.

key.name: regular-auto-launch-interval
key.summary: Interval (in days) when to auto launch for normal updates
key.description: The interval (in days) when auto launching update-manager for normal updates. Please note that it will auto launch for security updates immediately. If you set it to "0" it will also launch as soon as updates become available.

key.name: no-show-notifications
key.description: Do not display a notification when updates are available.

key.name: release-check-time
key.description: The last time update-notifier checked for a new release. The format is seconds since UNIX epoch.
